lead_paragraph: The chef Bryan Moon opened the mostly Korean takeout shop under the Marcy Avenue subway stop in November with his older brother Mike.

headline.main: At Kichin in Brooklyn, Korean Fried Chicken and Mighty Rice Balls

snippet: The chef Bryan Moon opened the mostly Korean takeout shop under the Marcy Avenue subway stop in November with his older brother Mike.
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Kichin restaurant in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
